summary.overview: The user, identifying as a farmer, expresses significant difficulties and concerns, directly asking what 'Rajiv ji' is doing to help them. The AI acknowledges the user's distress and attempts to confirm their profession.
summary.user_tone: distressed and direct, with a sense of urgency

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Namaskar Bhaiya, hum Sunita Devi bolat hain, Rajesh Verma ji ke taraf se. Kaise hain aap? Hum aapke chinta ke baare mein jaanana chahat hain, aapke yahan sabse badi samasya ka baa?

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.text: Chintaen to kaafi hain. Aap yah bataiye ki Rajiv ji, hum kisaanon ke liye kya kar rahe hain? Hum bade hi dikkat mein hain.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Hum aapke dikkat ke baare mein

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: samajh sakte hain, Bhaiya. Aap kisan hain ka? Hum sunat
